pages.text: jin (musalaamo) se (kaafir) jung kar rahe hai, unhe bhi muqaable ki ijaazath di jaati hai, kyo ke wo mazloom hai, beshak un ki madad par Allah qaadir hai

ye wo hai jinhe na haq apne gharo se nikala gaya, sirf un ke us qaul par ke hamaara parvardigaar faqath Allah hai, agar Allah ta’ala logo ko aapas mein ek dosre se na hata ta rehta, to ibaadath khaane aur girje aur masjide aur yahoodiyo ke ma-badh aur wo masjide bhi dha di jaati, jahaan Allah ka naam ba kasrath liya jaata hai, jo Allah ki madad karega, Allah bhi zaroor us ki madad karega, beshak Allah ta’ala badi khuwwato waala, bade ghalbe waala hai

ye wo log hai ke agar hum zameen mein un ke paao jama de, to ye puri paabandi se namaaze qaayam kare aur zakaate de aur acche kaamo ka hukm kare aur bure kaamo se mana kare, tamaam kaamo ka anjaam Allah ke eqtiyaar mein hai
agar ye log aap ko jhutlaaye (to koyi tajjub ki baath nahi) to in se pehle Nuh(alaihissalaam) ki khaum aur aadh aur samoodh
aur khaume Ibraheem aur khaume Looth
aur madyan waale bhi apne apne nabiyo ko jhutla chuke hai, Mosa(alaihissalaam) bhi jhutlaaye ja chuke hai, pas main ne kaafiro ko yo hee si mahullath di, phir dhar dabaya, phir mera azaab kaisa hoa

bahuth si bastiyaan hai, jinhe hum ne teh-wa-baala3 kar diya, is liye ke wo zaalim thein, pas wo apni chatho ke bal aundhi hoyi padi hai aur bahuth se abaadh koye bekaar pade hai aur bahuth se pakke aur bulandh mahel viraan pade hai

kya unhone zameen mein sair wa siyaahath nahi ki, jo un ke dil un baatho ke samajhne waale hote, ya kaano se hee un (waaqeyaath) ko sun lete, baath ye hai ke sirf aankhe hee andhi nahi hoti, balke wo dil andhe ho jaate hai jo sino mein hai
